news-not-found: No news articles were found for this campaign

slug.name: Short name of the article
slug.warning: Editing this field is going to change the link to the news article, and make the current one invalid
slug.placeholder: The default value is the same as  'Article title'

source-link.label: Link to source
source-link.field-description:
This field is only necessary if the article is taken from another source.
Leave empty if you are the author of this article

actions.no-access:
No access to this action
Please contact campaign's coordinator
